Class DeclensionTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.net.heaven.lavi.morphology.inflect.DeclensionTable
  • public class DeclensionTable
extends java.lang.Object

    Holds the declension items and makes the composition work easy.

    Author:
    almir jr.
